page.title: 01S.W.ARBROATH AND DISTRICT.
page.content: One corner of our area covers the South-West quarter of the town of Arbroath,including the industrial estate.Arbroath is a coastal town which now relies less upon the fishing {industry}than it did in the past. Arbroath is still a popular holiday resort and many people still make a living thanks to{tourism}.The rest of the area consists mostly of good {farming}land, from the village of Arbirlot in the North-West corner down to the coast.The main Dundee road and rail links provide good {communications}for commuters and shoppers.Between the railway line and the pebbled beach lies the West Links where there are many organised activities for tourists in the summer. There are many hotels and guest houses as well as two well equipped caravan sites nearby.
